nodes.text: The Bala D'ur Slaver Camps was the hideout of Bala D'ur pirates on Hoth during the Galactic War. It doubled as a slaver camp, in which they kept their Ortolan prisoners, working them to death.
The Bala D'ur Slaver Camps appear as an area on Hoth in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
